title: Veteran Reward and Server Transfer
body: Hello i was wondering if the veteran emote reward counted the hours we had clocked up from being on a previous server before transferring, i played around a year and a half on the North American server before the oceanic server was made and played more on and off after the transfer even if i am not eligible for the next emote tier im still curious.

replies.body:
Hey

I checked your account and you've got the right one for hours played, and yes we do take into account time you played on NA!  I'm not sure which tier emote you're hoping for, but you are on the highest one already!

Cheers
Mindstar

Thanks for the reply, i couldn't readily find information on what each tier looked like so i wasn't sure what tier my emote was and there is no name that pops up when i look at my emotes. I'm happy to know it takes into account previous hours and that i reached the final tier, thanks again!
